NormalAlgorithmComboBox.ToolTip: Choose the algorithm to calculate the Vertex normals with.

SmoothCheckBox.ToolTip: The Modell is drawn using the Vertex normals.

SolidCheckBox.ToolTip: The Triangles are drawn as surfaces.

MeshCheckBox.ToolTip: The Edges are drawn as lines.

VerticesCheckBox.ToolTip: The Vertices are drawn as points.

TriangleNormalsCheckBox.ToolTip: The Triangle normals are drawn as lines.

VertexNormalsCheckBox.ToolTip: The Vertex normals are drawn as lines.

XAxisCheckBox.ToolTip: The x-axis is drawn as a line.

YAxisCheckBox.ToolTip: The y-axis is drawn as a line.

ZAxisCheckBox.ToolTip: The z-axis is drawn as a line.

PickingModeComboBox.ToolTip: No Picking, Vertex, Edge or Triangle Picking.

ObjParser.ObjHeader: # Written by the TriMM ObjParser (by Christian Moritz)

OffParser.OffCounterError: The file has to contain the numbers of Vertices, Triangles and Edges!
OffParser.OffHeader: # Written by the TriMM OffParser (by Christian Moritz)

PlyParser.PlyBrokenFileError: The file is not a PLY file, or it is broken!
PlyParser.PlyTriangleError: At least one of the faces is not a triangle!
PlyParser.PlyHeader: comment Written by the TriMM PlyParser (by Christian Moritz)

Settings.NAError: Only the numbers 0 to 12 are allowed for the normal algorithm setting!
Settings.PICKError: The picking mode (PICK) must be either 0, 1, 2 or 3!
Settings.SMOOTHError: Only the values 0 and 1 are allowed for the SMOOTH setting!
Settings.SOLIDError: Only the values 0 and 1 are allowed for the SOLID setting!
Settings.MESHError: Only the values 0 and 1 are allowed for the MESH setting!
Settings.VERTError: Only the values 0 and 1 are allowed for the VERT setting!
Settings.TRINORMError: Only the values 0 and 1 are allowed for the TRINORM setting!
Settings.VERTNORMError: Only the values 0 and 1 are allowed for the VERTNORM setting!
Settings.XAXISError: Only the values 0 and 1 are allowed for the XAXIS setting!
Settings.YAXISError: Only the values 0 and 1 are allowed for the YAXIS setting!
Settings.ZAXISError: Only the values 0 and 1 are allowed for the ZAXIS setting!
Settings.SETBrokenFileError: This Settings file is broken or not a TriMM-Settings file at all!
Settings.SETHeader: # Settings for TriMM, the TriangleMesh Manipulator

LoadSettingsMenuItem.ToolTip: Loads the settings from a .SET file.

SaveSettingsMenuItem.ToolTip: Saves the settings to a .SET file.

MakeStandardMenuItem.ToolTip: Accept the current settings as standard.

ColorComboBox.ToolTip: Choose the part whose color you want to change.

ColorTextBox.ToolTip: The floating point RGB values of the color.

ResetColorsButton.ToolTip: Resets the colors to the standard settings.

ResetDisplayButton.ToolTip: Resets the display options to the standard settings.

TriMMControl.HandleCreatedError: The control's window handle has not been created!
TriMMControl.DeviceContextCreationError: Unable to create an OpenGL device context!
TriMMControl.PixelFormatError: Unable to find a suitable pixel format!
TriMMControl.PixelFormatSetError: Unable to set the requested pixel format!
TriMMControl.RenderingContextCreationError: Unable to create an OpenGL rendering context!
TriMMControl.MakeCurrentContextError: Unable to activate this control's OpenGL rendering context!
TriMMControl.PaintError: No device or rendering context available!

ClippingPlaneLabel.ToolTip: Moves the clipping plane. 1.1 is in the back, -1.1 is in the front.

ObservedLabel.ToolTip: The index of the observed Vertex, Edge or Triangle. -1 means nothing is selected.

RadiusLabel.ToolTip: Radius of the sphere around the observed Vertex. The radius of the cylinder around the observed Edge is 1/10 of that value.

ScreenshotButton.ToolTip: Makes a screenshot (png, bmp or jpg) of the scene.

OpenMenuItem.ToolTip: Load a TriangleMesh from a file (.OBJ, .OFF, .PLY, .STL).

SaveMenuItem.ToolTip: Save the TriangleMesh to a file (.OBJ, .OFF, .PLY, .STL).

CloseMenuItem.ToolTip: Close the current file, keeping the settings.

ViewMenuItem.ToolTip: Show the visualization of the TriangleMesh.

VerticesTextBox.ToolTip: Shows the number of Vertices in the TriangleMesh.

EdgesTextBox.ToolTip: Shows the number of Edges in the TriangleMesh.

TrianglesTextBox.ToolTip: Shows the number of Triangles in the TriangleMesh.

RemoveSinglesButton.ToolTip: Removes all Vertices that do not belong to any Triangle.

RemoveDoubleVertButton.ToolTip: Removes duplicates of Vertices and adjusts the Triangles.

Remove2NVerticesButton.ToolTip: Removes Vertices that have only two neighboring Vertices.

RemoveSelectedButton.ToolTip: Removes the Vertex determined by the coordinates above, if it exists.

AddVertexButton.ToolTip: Adds the Vertex determined by the coordinates chosen above.

MoveObservedButton.ToolTip: Moves the Vertex picked in the visualization to the coordinates chosen above.

TransposeVertexButton.ToolTip: Moves the Vertex picked in the visualization by adding the coordinates chosen above to it's position.

MoveAlongNormalButton.ToolTip: Moves the Vertex determined by the coordinates above, by the value selected below, along its normal vector.

DistanceLabel.ToolTip: The distance to move the Vertex.

FlipEdgeButton.ToolTip: Flips the Edge determined by the endpoints above by connecting the opposite corners of the incident Triangles instead.

SubdivideEdgeButton.ToolTip: Subdivides the Edge determined by the endpoints above by connecting the midege Vertex to the opposite corners of the incident Triangles.

RemoveEdgeButton.ToolTip: Removes the Edge determined by the endpoints above .

ALabel.ToolTip: First corner of the Triangle, in counter-clockwise order.

BLabel.ToolTip: Second corner of the Triangle, in counter-clockwise order.

CLabel.ToolTip: Third corner of the Triangle, in counter-clockwise order.

RemoveColinButton.ToolTip: Removes all Triangles that have three colinear Vertices.

RemoveDoubleButton.ToolTip: Removes all duplicates of Triangles, irrespectve of orientation.

FlipAllTrianglesButton.ToolTip: Changes the orientation and thus the direction of the normal vector for all Triangles.

FlipSelectedTriangleButton.ToolTip: Changes the orientation and thus the direction of the normal vector for the Triangle determined by the Vertex-indices chosen above.

SubdivideMeshButton.ToolTip: Subdivides all Triangles by connecting the midege Vertices. 4 new Triangle for every Triangle.

SubdivideTriangleButton.ToolTip: Subdivides the Triangle pdetermined by the Vertex-indices selected above by connecting the midege Vertices. 4 new Triangle for every Triangle.

RemoveTriangleButton.ToolTip: Removes the Triangle determined by the Vertex-indices selected above.

AddTriangleButton.ToolTip: Adds the Triangle determined by the Vertex-indices selected above.

Vector.DotProductError: The vectors need to be of equal length for the dot product!
Vector.CrossProductError: The cross product is only defined for 3D vectors!
Vector.LengthError: The vectors need to be of equal length!
Vector.DivisionByZeroError: Vectors are not dividible by zero!
